lines.text: Playtime is over. I'll get this straight. You'll be here as long as I need you. While you're here, you do what I say, when I say it, now get back inside.
I was looking for an old friend. A kid, Ray Castor. They told me he lived here.
Oh, he has moved.
Do you happen to know where I can find him?
He sold his house. His business is everything. I think he went back to Madrid.
Haven't you ever loved anyone?
Yes, once, when I was a child. She taught me to hate.
Well, what do you want from an old friend?
I want you to help me play a hunch.
Alfredi.
And you locked me up in here, won't you afraid I'm not trying to kill myself?
I watched you. Another type of girl would've killed herself. Want something else?
No. Not bad. Where did you learn to cook, kidnap school?
Let's talk about you, for unshift.
OK. I'm not like you, I'll answer.
Were you in love with the professor?
Once, yes. But not anymore.
That's not very original.
He's intelligent, kind. Human polities may be finding yourself if you bother to look.
Those make bad judgements.
How long did you been spying on me?
